episodes.title: Episode Forty-Five: Will The Real Tim Shady Please Stand Up?
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: It's been a rough couple weeks for Ben but the boys pull it together for an interview with Tim Jensen. But which one?

episodes.title: Episode Forty-Four: Sweet Dreams & Flying Machines
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy goes it alone tonight at the station as Ben's Notebook comes to an end live on-air.

episodes.title: Episode Forty-Three: Rumor Has It
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Ben puts the finishing touches on his master plan while Sammy seems to know the reason behind the strange weather patterns that have plagued the town the past few weeks.

episodes.title: Episode Forty-Two: A Little Help From My Friends
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Not invited to the 8th Annual Best Small Town in America Celebration, Sammy & Ben are taking listener calls. Just not about the Rainbow Lights over Libbydale please.

episodes.title: Episode Forty-One: This Little Light of Mine
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben ring in the new year with Rainbow Lights coming from Old Man Libbydale's Farm.

episodes.title: Episode Forty: A King Falls Christmas Story
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben lack the holiday spirit during this year's Tree Lighting ceremony, until receiving a call from an unlikely townsperson.

episodes.title: Message From Management
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Important Message - December 15th Episode

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-Nine: Take a Look, It's In a Book
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: A slow night comes to an exciting end as Sammy & Ben try to beat out Channel 13 on a last minute scoop at the Beauregard Estate.

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-Eight: Democracy Derby
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben report live outside a polling station while awaiting the run-off election results for the King Falls mayoral race.

episodes.title: Election Special: Rock The Vote
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben cover the mayoral election results in this special edition of King Falls AM.

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-Seven: In a Row?
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: With a week to go until the biggest election in King Falls history, Sammy & Ben are taking your calls with election questions.

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-Six: Polter-Heist
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy hangs out in studio with Chet Sebastian as Ben heads to the King Falls Public Library to catch up with some old friends.

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-Five: Dear Diary
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy and Ben get a call from a newcomer to King Falls with an interesting find from her attic.

episodes.title: King Falls AM - Original Podcast Soundtrack: Volume One
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Ben plays us a track from King Falls AM - Original Podcast Soundtrack, available now on iTunes, Google Play, Amazon, Spotify and all your favorite digital music providers!

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-Four: Blind, Deaf & Dumb
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: It's a big night in King Falls as Ben moderates the first, and possibly only, Mayoral Debate between Mayor Grisham, Ron Begley & Herschel Baumgartner.

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-Three: E.T., Text Home
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben don't see eye-to-eye about sending correspondents to Libbydale Farms after reported UFO activity strikes again.

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-Two: Smokey & The Banshee
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: A frantic call from Deputy Troy puts Sammy & Ben at the center of some on-air grand theft auto.

episodes.title: News & Website Update
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy delivers some exciting King Falls AM news.

episodes.title: Episode Thirty-One: The Forgotten
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy and Ben clash over Merv's decision to add a weekly weather report, and weatherman, to the show.

episodes.title: Episode Thirty: Bright Lights, Little City
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Ben continues his notebook work; scheduling an interview with a local cemetery groundskeeper while stumbling onto a big lead.

episodes.title: Alt Channel Introduction
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy introduces the new King Falls AM Alt Channel.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-Nine: Dread, White and Blue
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: A political chess match erupts days before July 4th, while Ben continues to surprise Sammy with his notebook's plan of action.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-Eight: Are You Gonna Go My Way
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy and Ben try to settle back into a normal routine but after an upsetting call from Reverend Hawthorne, all hell breaks loose. #Benemies

episodes.title: A Thank You From Sammy
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: A quick thank you from Sammy Stevens to the listeners of King Falls AM.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-Seven: Cronkite, Brokaw, Ben Arnold
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: With Ben still missing in action, Sammy tries to make the best of a bad situation with Chet Sebastian as guest host.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-Six: A Second-Hand Emotion
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben are still recovering from the Sammiversary Surprise while breaking news about the upcoming King Falls Annual Bass Tournament.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-Five: Happy Sammiversary
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Come join Sammy, Ben & friends in celebrating the 1 Year Anniversary of the show & Sammy moving to King Falls!

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-Four: The McGuff Files
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben are celebrating the memory of Rich McGuff, however Tim Jensen's odd behavior seems to have the town captivated.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-Three: I Got 99 Problems But A Tim Ain't One
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Ben holds down the fort in-studio as Sammy makes the trek to the Jensen residence for Tim's first public interview.

episodes.title: Zero Tolerance Policy
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Deputy Troy & Emily Potter fill us in on the town's issue with April 1st.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-Two: Somewhere Under The Rainbow
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: The Rainbow Light's continued presence has King Falls on edge and the action heats up at Lake Hatchenaw over what Herschel & Cecil reeled in two weeks ago.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty-One: Swimmin' With Kingsie
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Reverend Xavier Hawthorne unveils his newest plans for King Falls and the boys get a worrisome call from Lake Hatchenaw.

episodes.title: Episode Twenty: Referencing Aladdin Don't Make It Right
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben get a quick update on the little ones off Route 72 and learn live on-air that not everyone had a great evening the night of the Valentine's Day Dance.

episodes.title: Episode Nineteen: Beasts of Burden
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: It's Chet Sebastian's last night co-hosting with Ben during Sammy's mandatory two week "vacation" and the annual King Falls Valentine's Day Dance weighs heavily on Ben's mind.

episodes.title: Episode Eighteen: Make King Falls Great Again
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Come join Sammy, Ben, Mayor Grisham & the entire King Falls community down at the Main Street park to celebrate winning the Best Small Town in America prize for the 7th straight year!

episodes.title: Episode Seventeen: Give Peas a Chance
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben are ringing in the New Year, however things come to a head when Deputy Troy wants to bring by Ben's late Christmas present.

episodes.title: Episode Sixteen: Santa Claus Ain't Comin' To Town
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: It's the last show before Holiday Break and Sammy is excited to bring news of a King Falls legend he has unearthed, much to the dismay of Ben. #OperationKingFallsKringle

episodes.title: Episode Fifteen: Stormy Weather, More at Eleven
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: When Channel 13's Award-winning weatherman endures an on-air meltdown, Ben laughs it up with the King Falls AM listeners. Until he realizes what he thought was a drunken rant might actually be the symptoms of an ancient Indian curse.

episodes.title: Episode Fourteen: Date Night At The Library
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben welcome Dan & Larry from television's Mission: Apparition to King Falls with an exclusive interview and investigation from the King Falls Library.

episodes.title: Episode Thirteen: Crop Circle Jerk
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: An emergency at Libbydale Farms has Deputy Troy and King Falls AM on high alert. Mysterious lights? Check. Crop Circles? Check. Intergalactic Gang War? Stay tuned to 660 on the AM Dial to find out.

episodes.title: Episode Twelve: All The Pretty Flowers
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Against Ben's wishes, Sammy broaches a touchy subject after witnessing a hearse delivering white roses on his way into the station. Is it a King Falls Halloween tradition or could it be something more sinister? #RedRumRoses

episodes.title: Episode Eleven: Ringin' Hell's Doorbell
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: After an unexpected listener call-in, the boys find a cassette tape in the mail and listen live as an adventure unfolds from one of King Falls less-friendly hiking trails.

episodes.title: Episode Ten: Medium Rare
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben welcome in studio guest, medium Miss Olivia DuPont, however a miscommunication of her talents brings up some painful memories that both Ben & Deputy Troy wish to forget.

episodes.title: Episode 9: Jack in The Box Jesus
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: An alleged sighting of the Lord & Savior at a downtown fast food restaurant has the residents of King Falls ready for deliverance, meanwhile Sammy & Ben try to navigate the flood waters of this revelation.

episodes.title: Episode Eight: Electrolocaust Now
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben have planned a tribute to King Falls AM's resident jazz legend Chet Sebastian, however an impromptu, and selective power failure, takes out most of the station's broadcast tools, leaving the boys to fend for themselves.

episodes.title: Episode Seven: Major Tom to Ground Control
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: The boys at King Falls AM receive a phone call from a familiar voice that sends the show, as well as the residents of King Falls, into an uproar.

episodes.title: Episode Six: King of King Falls
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: In an effort to learn more about his new hometown, Sammy books an interview with author and King Falls historian, Howard Ford Beauregard III, however Ben questions Sammy's intentions as well as Beauregard's facts.

episodes.title: Episode Five: Night of The Living Dread
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben learn of some breaking news regarding the Lake Hatchenhaw John Doe, but not everyone is as pleased as the broadcast duo.

episodes.title: Episode Four: Wolves Gone Wild
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: With Sammy & Ben in contention over a forced apology regarding the Bass Tournament, a full moon causes all hell to break loose on the outskirts of King Falls.

episodes.title: Episode Three: Catch & Release
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben are live at Lake Hatchenhaw for the 55th Annual King Falls Bass Tournament with special guest Mayor Grisham.

episodes.title: Episode Two: That Book is Overdue, President Lincoln
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: Sammy & Ben have Emily Potter, the new town librarian, in studio to talk about the Grand Re-Opening of the King Falls Public Library as well as the mysterious reason it was shut down. All that and more, this week on King Falls AM.

episodes.title: King Falls AM - Episode 1 - May 1, 2015
episodes.author: King Falls AM
episodes.summary: It's host Sammy Steven's first show at King Falls AM! Producer Ben Arnold reluctantly helps co-host while the King Falls residents call in about the mysterious lights emanating off Route 72. All that and more, this week on King Falls AM.
